resources.string: There are no elements to edit.
Choose an element to base your custom on.
Temperature that particles of this element start at. Pull slider all the way left to default to atmosphere temperature.
Temperature below which the element freezes into the chosen lower element.
Temperature above which the element melts into the chosen higher element.
Element which this one will freeze into.
Element which this one will melt into.
How dense the element is. This determines how fluids collide.
How many grid squares per frame the element falls.
How the element responds to force. Higher inertia means it reacts less to force from explosions. Unmovable creates something that is fixed to the canvas and can never move, like Wall.
Sorry, this element file seems to be corrupt. Please try another element.
Select what your element will look like
Failed to save element, make sure you have an SD card inserted and mounted.
Error: You cannot have an empty element name!
